origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_financial_report', 'description': 'This function retrieves the financial report for a given company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company for which the financial report is requested.'}, {'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial report, e.g., annual, quarterly.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'financialReport', 'description': 'The financial report of the company.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_financial_report, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Microsoft', 'reportType'是'annual'.
